snippet: Brazil’s defense minister has agreed to investigate military facilities where human rights abuses were believed to have been committed during the country’s 21-year dictatorship.
lead_paragraph: Brazil’s defense minister has agreed to investigate military facilities where human rights abuses were believed to have been committed during the country’s 21-year dictatorship.

headline.main: Brazil to Focus on Past Abuses
headline.print_headline: Brazil to Focus On Past Abuses

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
